PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-01032008-01-29,  INDUSTRY,  ,  , 
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Industry of STAN BRACKEN-HORROCKS of Kelowna, British Columbia, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Business Development Bank of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective April 7, 2008.
